title: Cover, 17th century
dimensions: H x W: 183 x 127 cm (6 ft. 1/16 in. x 50 in.)
description: Reticella squares joined by a band of sheer linen with reticella insertions finished with a three-inch pointed reticella edge. The designs are circles, half circles and star shapes within circles and squares.

tombstone.epitaph:
Cover, 17th century.Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace (reticella). 1952-162-124.
